name: Skinwalker Ranch
description:
~ EMBARK ON A SHORT PYGAME JOURNEY! ~

You're crashed on a strange ranch with your crew of aliens. Find a way to repair your saucer!

Discover 3 different minigames around the ranch:

  • GIVE ME A SIGN - Reach the farmhouse to get some help from the locals!
    A classic runner game where you have to avoid obstacles standing in your way.
  • WHACK-A-LIEN - Help the farmer and save the cows to get some fuel!
    A casual point and shoot minigame with limited rounds and reload feature.
  • LUMBER SLUMBER - Rearrange the timber in time to get the materials!
    A hanoi tower mockup with limited steps.

Each completed minigame counts towards your goal to repair the saucer. That is to unlock the last minigame:

  • FIELD TRIP - Reach the end of the asteroid field to escape from the planet!
    A short yet exciting space shooter with upgrading weaponry.
~ SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ~

The game is compatible with Windows 10.
I haven't tested other Windows versions but they should run the game as well.
The game needs no extra setups, just unzip the folder and can run it directly by opening the .exe file.

~ DISCLAIMER ~

All game components (including assets, sounds and music) are created with love and passion by myself. Please honor my work and avoid using these assets for your own projects.
